title: 820-2936 water damaged, battery not detected
message:
It was water damaged. closed to ISL, changed it and worked fine except battery not detected. Found
R5280=3.4V both side, R5281=3.4v both side. Checked BIL looks good. Any help please.

title: 820-2936 water damaged, battery not detected
message:
Check traces and solders for pins 10/11 of ISL6259.
Post resistance to ground at SCL/SDA lines of battery bus.
Also post exact voltage for PPBUS_G3H.

title: 820-2936 water damaged, battery not detected
message:
traces and solders for pins 10/11 of ISL6259. looks good.
resistance to ground at SCL=.455 and sdl=.456
exact voltage for PPBUS_G3H=12.4 v .Thanks.

title: 820-2936 water damaged, battery not detected
message:
Bad SMC, or battery in this case.
I would test a known good battery first.
Also recommend you try another ISL6259.
Last solution, change the SMC...

title: 820-2936 water damaged, battery not detected
message: Try another ISL6259  and now see no green light

title: 820-2936 water damaged, battery not detected
message:
Bad solders I suppose.
Post again the values mentioned before.

title: 820-2936 water damaged, battery not detected
message:
PPBUS_G3H=.0.5v
resistance to ground at SCL=.462  and sdl=.461

title: 820-2936 water damaged, battery not detected
message:
Yeah, something happened when you changed ISL6259.
Check all solders and be sure didn't knock off any component.
Post volatge for pins 1, 2, 3, 12, 13, 14, 9, 15, 19, 20, 28.
Check resistance between pins 17/18 and 27/28 (ohm mode).

title: 820-2936 water damaged, battery not detected
message:
Checked all solders looks very good and no missing any components.
Voltage of ISL
pin1=0v
pin2=16.58v
pin3=3.95v
pin9=0v
pin12=1.1v
pin13=0.8v
pin14=0.8v
pin15=0v
pin19=5v
pin20=5v
pin28=16.46v

Registance ( ohm mode) betw pins 17/18=2.9 ohm
Registance ( ohm mode) betw pins 27/28=20 ohm

title: 820-2936 water damaged, battery not detected
message:
"pin12=1.1v"
Bad value for 3V42.
Post voltages for U6990.

title: 820-2936 water damaged, battery not detected
message:
Volteges for U6990:
PIN9 P3V42G3H=1.1V
PIN8 P3V42G3H_FB= 4.9V
PIN7 PPVIN_G3H_P3V42G3H=16.6V
PIN6 P3V42G3H_SW=1.1V
PIN4 PPVIN_G3H_P3V42G3H=16.6V
PIN3 P3V42G3H_TON=11/12 NOT STABLE
PIN2 P3V42G3H_FB=4.9V

title: 820-2936 water damaged, battery not detected
message:
Check resistance to ground (diode mode) at L6995.
If good, check C6991/96 and R6995.
If all good, change U6990.
Be sure all traces and solders are OK.

title: 820-2936 water damaged, battery not detected
message: Changed U6990 and now see the green light and battery also detected , all tested passed. Thanks for your help.
